title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not calculate real GDP per capita for Banton for Year 2 as $20, does not calculate real GDP per capita for Menna for Year 2 as $30, and/or does not show the work.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Banton has the higher money supply in Year 2 and/or does not explain that using the quantity theory of money ( MV=PY MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaaeOvai aab2dacaqGqbGaaeywaaaa@3D16@ ), since the two nations have the same velocity of money and Banton has a higher nominal GDP in Year 2, Banton has the higher money supply.

The response states that Banton has the higher money supply in Year 2 and explains that using the quantity theory of money ( MV=PY MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaaeOvai aab2dacaqGqbGaaeywaaaa@3D16@ ), since the two nations have the same velocity of money and Banton has a higher nominal GDP in Year 2, Banton has the higher money supply.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Banton experienced the higher real interest rate and/or does not explain that Banton had lower inflation and the real interest rate is equal to the nominal interest rate minus the inflation rate.

The response states that Banton experienced the higher real interest rate and explains that Banton had lower inflation and the real interest rate is equal to the nominal interest rate minus the inflation rate.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Menna’s economy will move closer to its production possibilities curve and/or does not explain that Menna’s real GDP increased from $200 in Year 1 to $300 in Year 2 and cyclical unemployment will decrease.

The response states that Menna’s economy will move closer to its production possibilities curve and explains that Menna’s real GDP increased from $200 in Year 1 to $300 in Year 2 and cyclical unemployment will decrease.
